message.body: Listen to Milo Greene by Milo Greene on Spotify: http://open.spotify.com/album/15wQEsBsbl14I4m1yEuR8w
Ermergerd. Hey, say a prayer for me? Got some bad news from my doctor.
Hey, will you at least telle what's the matter
Yea, sorry. I had rehearsal and then went straight to new York and didn't really have the chance to call. There are some abnormal cells in my pap smear so I have to get a biopsy
Good thoughts. 9/10 of those come back clear according to the information super highway. You have my constant prayers.
Thank you, that means quite a bit. I'm taking it pretty hard - probably harder than I should.
